name: Sankofa Display
description: Sankofa Display is a captivating African typeface that draws inspiration from a rich tapestry of African art styles, with a particular focus on straight-line geometric designs. This typeface embodies the essence of Africa's diverse cultural heritage, blending elements from various artistic traditions. To contribute, see github.com/batsimadz/Sankofa-Display .
author: Batsirai Madzonga
